author: Dovydas V
title: Nice place in Paris center! Highly recommend.
text: We have traveling with a car in France. We want to stay in Paris. First of all we searched hotel with parking. This hotel saying that they have parking. But they don't have a own parking. You must to park in parking lot about 1km from hotel. So that's way its not good.
